thread.section_title: ScreenPrinting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenPrinting.com | screenprinting.com | 2 of 92
thread.title: Matthew Martin

author: Matthew Martin
title: Matthew Martin
text: I'm a newbie to screen printing but everything I've gotten at screenprinting.com has been really good quality and I now make all of my shirts for my small gym. They have lots of great videos to watch for technique and "how to" or troubleshooting common screen printing issues. I've saved a ton of money making my own shirts which means I've made a lot more per sale too!
